alert.note: Alert for Armstrong (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:56PM CDT until August 05 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR ARMSTRONG COUNTY... At 456 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of Palo Duro Canyon, or 12 miles southwest of Claude, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Armstrong County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
